data.message: Hate new chat...getting ridiculous...and more complicated!!  If its not broke dont fix it!!

replies.message: Hi Vicki. While you can't remove Camera, it's an optional feature that you can choose to use. -Jon
Please figure out a way to DELETE the camera & bring back the chat...
Hasn't showed up on my iPad yet, thankfully. Facebook has ruined my iPhone app. I won't be updating my iPad.
Hey Jon, many of us loyal Facebook users want our chat sidebar back and have zero interest in the new camera feature.
Notice how someone from Facebook will never answer to the comments about removing the update....
Please allow us to opt out we don't want it
Hi Marc. While you can't remove Camera, it's an optional feature that you can choose to use. -Jon
Give us a way to HIDE this optional feature!

Why can I no longer unblock someone from my blocked list. The "unblock" button does not work. I only use a smart phone not a computer. With the number of people who use just their phone and no longer use computers the function should be able to use irregardless of what they choose to use. Please fix this. Very frustrating.
